Just finished up watching it... Stand by original rating of A/V/ 6.0/6.5... Video clean & crisp. Blue tint to it which is really bad in a vibrant colorful movie like this one but watchable. I understand that a lot of people don't like paying money to see stuff at the cinema, and i agree. Why pay when you can download it for free right??
But this is one film that really does deserve your time and money to be seen in the cinema, in 3d.
You are denying yourself an amazing experience if you don't. 
A Telesync simply isnt going to do this movie justice. Don't get me wrong, i'm very grateful to the uploader, and i will be downloading, but see it in the cinema first is all i can say...you're missing out if you don't!! :)
